alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Robeson County through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of strong thunderstorms that extended from 8 miles north of Rex to Mccoll. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Maxton, Wakulla, Rex, Prospect, Shannon, Raemon, Parkton, Rennert and Lumber Bridge. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 35 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
